name: Just Tetris
description:
This is a version of Tetris that I made in Unity. It's not very good; honestly, it's got problems. But hey: wanna make my nonexistent UI actually functional? The source files are included. Wanna make it look nicer? The source files are included. Wanna fix some bugs in it? The source files are included. Wanna put sound in it? Source files.  Controller support? Source files. Multiplayer? Source files. Change my tetromino choice algorithm? Source files. Add a scoring system? Repeat after me: Source. Files. 

Wanna make your own Tetris game? Do so at your own digression, but the source files are included; please credit me and let me know if you do! All code is mine. Feel free to edit it. I do not own Tetris.

Controls:

Left: Move Left

Right: Move Right

Down: Soft Drop

Up: Rotate Right

Z: Rotate Left

Spacebar: Hard Drop

C: Hold

Esc: Quit

R: Restart

Why did I make this?

All versions of Tetris on itch.io are terrible, except this one which is just okay (it doesn't really have tee-spins which I feel bad about but whatever). Feel largely based on the flash version of Tetris (https://tetris.com/play-tetris). I was going to make a different kind of Tetris game but now I don't want to. So maybe you'll make it. Or maybe I'll make it eventually. I don't really know.
